channel.title: My attempt at making a website
channel.description: Recent content on My attempt at making a website

item.title: First Attempt at making a website
item.description:
I decided to make a website. Here, I will explain why I am doing this, what I used for this. Yeah, I think that’s all. This “post” is very much just a test to see if it actually works.

Why am I doing this?

When posting on Twitter, I often notice that my thoughts get way too long for the platform, so I recently started playing again with the idea of having my own website. Admittedly, I’ve had this idea fairly often, but this is the first time I’m actually doing it.
